Title: On the ten realities of life
Summary: The reason is simple: we are entities formed out of ignorance . Of this world, we know very little; we can only know little. The reason for the existence of this world is that we know nothing .

Title: Kano, Osun NNPP, PDP reps members defect to APC
Summary: Kano, Osun NNPP, PDP reps members defect to APC . Abdullahi Rogo and Kabiru Rurum have defected to the ruling All Progressives Congress (APC)

Title: Reimagining governance in Nigeria: A post-western democratic framework
Summary: Nigeria has operated a Western-style democratic system that has unfortunately failed . The adversarial, winner-takes-all model has divided us, writes Fem Fem Femi Ogunlesi .

Title: Drift to one-party state
Summary: Dr. Abdullahi Ganduje, the national chairman of All Progressives Congress (APC), does not see anything wrong in a one-party state . From his body language he will not mind if all parties in this country collapse their structures and move over to the APC .

Summary: The nation has witnessed a fresh wave of terror as bandits and jihadist groups, notably from Boko Haram and Islamic State West Africa Province, ISWAP, have unleashed deadly onslaughts across the country .

Title: DHQ dismisses viral video linked to terrorists’ attack in Borno
Summary: The Defence Headquarters described the video as a disinformation campaign . They said it is footage from an occurrence at a different location which was first posted on 7 December 2020 .

Title: VIDEO: Leah Sharibu turns 22 as mother marks seventh birthday in captivity
Summary: Leah Sharibu was one of the 110 students taken from the Government Girls’ Science and Technical College in Dapchi, Yobe State, on February 19, 2018 . Title: FG to track compliance with ‘Nigeria First’ policy
Summary: The Federal Government will assess performance of all Ministries, Departments and Agencies based on their compliance with the Nigeria First Policy . Minister of Industry, Trade and Investment, Jumoke Oduwole, said the policy is not new but a re-emphasis by President Bola Tinubu on the need to promote local content

Title: UN warns of fragile global economy amid rising trade tensions
Summary: The United Nations Department of Economic and Social Affairs has said that the global economy stands at a fragile turning point amid escalating trade tensions and growing policy uncertainties . The economic slowdown is widespread, affecting both developed and developing economies around the world . Trade-dependent economies are particularly vulnerable, UN DESA said in a report published on Thursday .

Title: South Korea resumes tariff talks with US Friday
Summary: Trade ministers from the top economies that make up APEC are meeting on South Korea’s Jeju Island amid concerns over the global trading system . Title: APC forum condemns protests over NCDC MD nominee
Summary: The North-Central All Progressives Congress Forum has condemned protests against Cyril Tsenyil’s nomination . The group known as the Concerned Plateau Youth Forum had, on Wednesday, called on President Bola Tinubu to withdraw the nomination . Forum described the group as faceless entities manipulated by opposition politicians .
